alert.note: Alert for Barton; Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 12:29AM CST until February 27 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cherokee County in southeastern Kansas... Southeastern Crawford County in southeastern Kansas... Southern Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 115 AM CST. * At 1229 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Columbus to near Quapaw to Wyandotte, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Lamar, Frontenac, Columbus, Oronogo, Jasper, Golden City, Cherokee, Weir, Alba, Scammon, Purcell, Chicopee, Nashville, Mindenmines, Carytown, Asbury, Neck City, Lamar Heights and Waco. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 47 and 66. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
